sections.heading: of tobacco license; reissue.(1) If a license issued under sections 28-1420 to 28-1429 is revoked and forfeited as provided in section 28-1425 for a violation of section 28-1429
sections.text: 04 or 28-1429.05, no new license shall be issued to such licensee until the expiration of five years after the date of such
